rules.description: Ctrl + C (Copy), Ctrl + V (Paste), Ctrl + X (Cut)
Strg + Click => Mark more than one element
Jump/(Select with shift) whole word to left
Jump/(Select with shift) whole word to right
Map a PC/ISO style German keyboard layout to MacOS (AltGr keys)
Home, Shift+Home => Cmd+Left arrow, Cmd+Shift+Left arrow (Move cursor to beginning of line with and without selection)
Ctrl+Home, Ctrl+Shift+Home => Cmd+Up arrow, Cmd+Shift+Up arrow (Move cursor to beginning of file with and without selection)
End, Shift+End => Cmd+right arrow, Cmd+Shift+right arrow (Move cursor to beginning of line with and without selection)
Ctrl+End, Ctrl+Shift+End => Cmd+down arrow, Cmd+Shift+down arrow (Move cursor to end of file with and without selection)
